content.query:
create MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'jpmia#2188';

drop CREDENTIAL uv_sas_token;
create DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL uv_sastoken WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacyx&se=2024-03-22T11:42:03Z&st=2024-03-21T03:42:03Z&spr=https&sig=LOAkkhJ2qt41bRXPEYrgMAUp5xYDYtpASLz9xHg8yZU%3D';

drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ext_usage_view_
create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ext_usage_view_
with (
    LOCATION='https://adlsjpmia.blob.core.windows.net/jpmiadata/usage_view/',
    CREDENTIAL = uv_sastoken
);

drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ext_biz_view_
create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ext_biz_view_
with (
    LOCATION='https://adlsjpmia.blob.core.windows.net/jpmiadata/biz_view/',
    CREDENTIAL = uv_sastoken
);

--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE jpmia.DimCompanies;
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT uv_delta_format
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec' -- Optional: specify compression codec
);


CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.DimCompanies
(
    company_id bigint,
            name NVARCHAR(200),
           description NVARCHAR(MAX),
           company_size int,
           formatted_company_size NVARCHAR(50),
           state NVARCHAR(100),
           country NVARCHAR(100),
           city NVARCHAR(100),
           zip_code NVARCHAR(100),
           address NVARCHAR(3000),
           url NVARCHAR(1000),
           ingest_date date
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'DimCompanies',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_usage_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
)
go;

select TOP 100 ingest_date from jpmia.DimCompanies;

------------

CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.DimCompanyIndustries
(
    company_id bigint,
  industries NVARCHAR(1000),
  ingest_date date
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'DimCompanyIndustries',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_usage_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
)
go;

select top 10 * from jpmia.DimCompanyIndustries;

----------------

CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.DimCompanySpecialities(
  company_id bigint,
  specialities NVARCHAR(3000),
  ingest_date date
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'DimCompanySpecialities',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_usage_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
)
go;

SELECT top 10 * from jpmia.DimCompanySpecialities;

-----------------

CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.DimJobBenefits(
  job_id bigint,
  inferred VARCHAR(10),
  type VARCHAR(2000),
  ingest_date date
  )
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'DimJobBenefits',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_usage_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
)
go;

select * from jpmia.DimJobBenefits;

------------------



CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.DimJobSkills(
  job_id	bigint,
  skill_abr NVARCHAR(1000),
  skill_name NVARCHAR(2000),
  ingest_date date
  )
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'DimJobSkills',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_usage_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
)
go;

select top 10 * from jpmia.DimJobSkills;

-------------

CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.FactCompanyEmployeeGrowth
(
  company_id bigint,
  employee_count bigint,
  follower_count bigint,
  time_recorded NVARCHAR(1000),
  date_time_recorded DATETIME2,
  date_recorded date,
  total_employees_as_of_now bigint,
  total_followers_as_of_now bigint,
  ingest_date date
  )
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'FactCompanyEmployeeGrowth',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_usage_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
)
go;

SELECT * from jpmia.FactCompanyEmployeeGrowth;

-------------
drop EXTERNAL TABLE jpmia.DimJobIndustries;
CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.DimJobIndustries(
  job_id	bigint,
  industry_id bigint,
  industry_name NVARCHAR(1000),
  ingest_date date
  )
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'DimJobIndustries',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_usage_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
)
go;

SELECT * from jpmia.DimJobIndustries;

--------

CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.DimJobSalaries
(
    salary_id bigint,
  job_id bigint,
  max_salary float,
  med_salary float,
  min_salary float,
  pay_period NVARCHAR(100),
  currency NVARCHAR(10),
  compensation_type NVARCHAR(100),
  ingest_date date
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'job_salaries',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_biz_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT=uv_delta_format
);

select top 10 * from jpmia.DimJobSalaries;

-------

CREATE EXTERNAL table jpmia.FactJobPostings
(
    job_id bigint, 
  company_id bigint,	
  locations NVARCHAR(500),	
  applies int,	
  original_listed_time NVARCHAR(100),	
  remote_allowed NVARCHAR(10),	
  views int,	
  job_posting_url	NVARCHAR(1000), 
  application_url NVARCHAR(1000),	
  application_type NVARCHAR(1000),	
  expiry NVARCHAR(100),	
  closed_time NVARCHAR(100),	
  experience_level NVARCHAR(100),	
  listed_time NVARCHAR(100),	
  posting_domain NVARCHAR(100),	
  sponsored NVARCHAR(100),	
  work_type NVARCHAR(100),	
  scraped NVARCHAR(100),
  ingest_date date
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'job_postings',
    DATA_SOURCE = ext_biz_view_,
    FILE_FORMAT=uv_delta_format
);

select top 10 * from jpmia.FactJobPostings;

SELECT * from sys.tables;
